testcase.name: A Wizard is vulnerable when not prepared with a spell
The toString method of the Warrior returns the correct description of the fighter
The Wizard class inherits from the Fighter class
The Warrior class overrides the toString method
The Wizard class overrides the isVulnerable method
The Warrior class is defined
A Warrior deals 10 damage to a vulnerable target
The Fighter class does not contain the prepareSpell method
A Wizard deals 12 damage after a spell has been prepared
The Wizard class overrides the getDamagePoints(Fighter) method
The toString method of the Wizard returns the correct description of the fighter
A Wizard deals 3 damage when no spell has been prepared
The Warrior class inherits from the Fighter class
The Warrior class overrides the isVulnerable method
A Wizard is not vulnerable when prepared with a spell
The Wizard class overrides the toString method
The Wizard class is defined
The Wizard class contains the prepareSpell method
The Warrior class overrides the getDamagePoints(Fighter) method
A Warrior deals 6 damage to an invulnerable target
A Warrior is never vulnerable
